- Quality: High detail, publication ready, no text

- Shading: Cel-shaded with soft gradients
- Color palette: {color_palette}

Korean webtoon establishing shot:

- Setting: Ancient mystical tower hidden in perpetual dense fog
- Architecture: Traditional East Asian tower, multi-story, weathered stone and dark wood
- Atmosphere: Mysterious, otherworldly, isolated from the world
- Fog: Extremely dense, tower partially obscured
- Time: {time_of_day}
- Lighting: Diffused, ethereal glow through fog
- Scale: Tower imposing, sense of hidden power
- Color palette: Blue-gray fog (#b8c5d6, #8a9eb5), dark architectural tones

- No characters
